title: Can someone help me with my rp issue?
body: _I recently purchased riot points the other day and i encountered a slight issue, when i tried redeeming them in the store it kept saying it was invalid. The thing is that i got them from Amazon.com so it was like a digital code so theres obviously no receipt for it, but i do have pictures of my purchase. In conclusion i bought two 10$ gift cards and neither of them will work. I would appreciate it if this could get resolved really soon. I will provide picture evidence of my purchase so you can see this is a big problem. Thank you for you're time riot games. {{champion:157}} _

replies.body: Rest easy, our billing team can look into this with you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll assist directly to see what happened.  Hang tight!
